recipe_ingredient.note: 2 tablespoons mixed whole spices (cumin, fennel and/or coriander)
recipe_ingredient.display: 2 tablespoons mixed whole spices (cumin, fennel and/or coriander)

recipe_ingredient.note: Flaky sea salt, freshly ground black pepper
recipe_ingredient.display: Flaky sea salt, freshly ground black pepper

recipe_ingredient.note: 4 ounces extra sharp cheddar, parmesan, or gruyere cheese
recipe_ingredient.display: 4 ounces extra sharp cheddar, parmesan, or gruyere cheese
recipe_ingredient.title: Dairy

recipe_instructions.text: Line a rimmed baking sheet with parchment paper.
Grate 4 ounces extra sharp cheddar cheese on the small holes of a box grater, right over the prepared baking sheet. Spread the cheese out evenly in a single layer.
Chop ½ cup nuts into lentil-ish sized pieces. Spread the nuts out over the parchment.
Coarsely chop 2 tablespoons whole spices (or grind in a mortar and pestle). Scatter them evenly over the baking sheet. Season cheese with freshly ground black pepper.

recipe_instructions.title: Bake:
recipe_instructions.text: Bake, rotating the baking sheet once halfway through to ensure even cooking, until all of the cheese has melted and turned light golden brown, 10-15 minutes.
Lightly season with flaky sea salt, just out of the oven.
Let cool entirely before breaking it into larger crackers. (If making ahead, store in an airtight container)
